channel.title: Help recommend me source!
channel.description: Hello i am very interested to ask people what source would be good. i whana use some good source which wont be laggy pr something but i dont know the good base so what would you guys recommend?

item.title: Help recommend me source!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“killerkody, post:30, topic:428192”]All the server sources recommend are good but it all depends on what your intentions are…

Are you in it for the money?

Do you know how to code?

Do you want to start off with a pre-made server?

Do you want Customs?

Is it a pking server or what do you want it to be?

If you want more help please pm me I can help you.[/quote]

You aren’t in a position to be recommending a base to anyone. Do you know how to “code” is the only thing that matters in what you just said.

Read full topic

All the server sources recommend are good but it all depends on what your intentions are…

Is it a pking server or what do you want it to be?

If you want more help please pm me I can help you.

item.title: Help recommend me source!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:10, topic:428192”][quote author=owns reece link=topic=530884.msg3877488#msg3877488 date=1325782455]
you might want a 508+ server, they’re a bit better but alot harder to code. i reccomend you start coding basic thing in PI and move up over time.
[/quote]

Yes but Pi are laggy arent they? i mean i know coder that said pi isnt good for host it laggs because of booleans and other not good stuff inside that makes all lagg.
so that why i whana code some up.
Maby i could use Dementhiums but all says it is very hard to code.[/quote]

Whoever told you It’s because of booleans is an idiot. If you’re just going to host it without writing anything yourself then I won’t help.

Read full topic
